event.executesql:
EXEC msdb.dbo.sp_send_dbmail @profile_name = 'WNBMail' ,@recipients = 'SQLReportGroup@WOODFOREST.com' ,@Subject = 'New SCRA Hero Account Offering Files are Ready to Process' ,@Body_format = 'HTML' ,@importance= 'High' ,@body = 'New SCRA Hero Account offering files are avilable for processing.

Procedures found here: http://portal.woodforest.net/sites/Architecture/Team/BI/Procedures/SCRA_HeroAccountQualificationProcedures.docx
Files to send are available here: \\Woodforest.net\Jobs\SCRA_HeroAccount\SendFiles

Please reply to all if you are going to take ownership.'
